title: Kirchhoff junction - I in resistors R 2R and 4R

content.question: The figure shows a portion of a circuit with three resistors. The resistors have the resistances and currents indicated. Which of the following correctly relates the currents in the resistors?

choices.label: <math alttext="I sub X is greater than I sub Z, which is greater than I sub Y" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>I</mi><mtext>X</mtext></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>I</mi><mtext>Z</mtext></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>I</mi><mtext>Y</mtext></msub></math>

<math alttext="I sub Y is greater than I sub Z, which is greater than I sub X" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>I</mi><mtext>Y</mtext></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>I</mi><mtext>Z</mtext></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>I</mi><mtext>X</mtext></msub></math>

<math alttext="I sub Z, is greater than open parenthesis, I sub X equals I sub Y, close parenthesis" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>I</mi><mtext>Z</mtext></msub><mo>></mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><msub><mi>I</mi><mtext>X</mtext></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>I</mi><mtext>Y</mtext></msub><mo>)</mo></mrow></math>

<math alttext="I sub Z is greater than I sub X, which is greater than I sub Y" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>I</mi><mtext>Z</mtext></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>I</mi><mtext>X</mtext></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>I</mi><mtext>Y</mtext></msub></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="I sub Z is greater than I sub X, which is greater than I sub Y" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>I</mi><mtext>Z</mtext></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>I</mi><mtext>X</mtext></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>I</mi><mtext>Y</mtext></msub></mstyle></math>

skill.text: 2.C: Compare physical quantities between two or more scenarios or at different times and locations in a single scenario.
